name: Personalisation Asset
description: Component to add personalisation to products

attribute_definitions.name: Product
attribute_definitions.description: Select the product SKU to be displayed.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Main Body Text Options
attribute_definition_groups.description: The options to style the text on the main body of the component.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Product Overlay Text Options
attribute_definition_groups.description: The text options to style the text.

attribute_definitions.name: Product Overlay Text Rotation
attribute_definitions.description: Number of degrees to rotate the text to align it to product image

attribute_definitions.name: Product Overlay Text Left (%) Position
attribute_definitions.description: Percentage left to align the text to the product image- defaults to 25

attribute_definitions.name: Product Overlay Text Top (%) Position
attribute_definitions.description: Percentage top to align the text to the product image- defaults to 50
